website_summaries.verdict: Made in the USA, high concentration, and great value. This is an affordable turmeric that buyers find effective.
pros: 95% curcuminoids, with bioperine/black pepper extract to improve absorption
Pills are easy to swallow for most people
Most buyers felt this was effective for relieving pain and without a bitter taste
cons: Some report it takes several weeks or months to realize any pain relief
Others find the pills are hard to swallow

customer_reviews.title: A+ Rating from a National Level Men's Physique Competitor
customer_reviews.text: As a national level competitor and spending the majority of my free time in the gym, joint pain and aches was something I thought i was going to have to deal with from moving heavy weight. Esp had problems with my elbows and knees. However, during my last contest prep and I added 500 mg nutricost Tumeric AM and another 500 mg in the PM and join pain is now a thing of the past. This is truly allowing me to push harder in the gym now that I am in the offseason adding size. Thanks again, nutricost. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Josh (IG:@jcarrfit)

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for pain relief and also to relieve inflammation. It does both. I gave it four stars instead of five because I'm also taking it to ward off dementia. And I won't know if it worked for that problem until far in the future. But it is a good product. I don't get any burning in my stomach like I've had with other turmeric products. I have no side effects in my stomach at all and I like that. Some can give you heartburn. They are very easy to swallow and I don't burp them either. Over all, I recommend this product for pain and inflammation.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Relief for joint pain.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first bottle of this product. It says it will take several weeks before you notice any relief. Others who have used it have highly recommended it. I have only used this for one week. After completing the first bottle, I have noticed some relief. I was taking the suggested one capsule per day, but found that it took two capsules per day to show any relief.
customer_reviews.author: Maga Di

customer_reviews.title: Quality Supplement
customer_reviews.text: I always research the best product before I purchase a supplement. I have an autoimmune disease which affects my skin. Turmeric helps with inflammation - which helps the condition of my skin. I take this supplement before bed each night. The benefits of Turmeric are numerous. I would recommend this product. The customer service team from eSupplements is top notch, they want to make sure you are happy with the product they sell.
customer_reviews.author: ButterBean6536Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Capsule
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening the bottle, it was clear that the capsules were brittle. Some were chipped where the two halves of the capsule meet and the turmeric leaked. Now, each time I get out a capsule I have to wash my hand to get the spilled turmeric off. Not a fan of these capsules.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I received my package in an orderly fashion. Am enjoying the results of this product and feeling a change in my body... Highly recommend this product! Happy to say that you guys carry 99.9% of everything that I need. Will continue supporting you guys. Also excellent customer service... No, complaints...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: but lots of loose Turmeric dust in the bottle not contained in the capsules which can stain and leave yellow traces on everything you touch
customer_reviews.author: Henry Kadish

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: great serving size. the pills are rather large though. my gf cant even take them
customer_reviews.author: kidron cobb

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Notice a slight increase in mood and my lower back/knee pain is about 100% gone since taking this. On paper it is supposed to be a great anti-inflammatory and it is living up to that (for me).
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic potency and easy to swallow.
customer_reviews.text: Clear capsules allows you to see the product. Great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: William F. Kazupski

customer_reviews.title: Hi potency, bioperine to aid absorption, great quality
customer_reviews.text: All of Nutricost's products are great... this one is no different. Excellent quality and value that I've come to expect with the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Frank D

customer_reviews.title: i buy it cause the bioperine would help me absorb better but dint come whit it. its a scam.
customer_reviews.text: Not the same product that showing in the image. i buy 1 item and it does not have bioperine that mean i wont be able to absorb well the product its a scam.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Nicely priced for this potent extract
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of turmeric/curcumin products available but from my research on the most potent antioxidant product you want the 95% curcuminoid extract. Most of the others have only a small portion of this extract with the remainder being turmeric root which has a much lower amount of curcumin. The product was well-packaged and the capsules were fine and easy to swallow, although I can understand with their larger size some might have trouble with them. I seem to have a little less body inflammation but time will tell. At least I know I am contributing to my overall health with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Janet P Lawry

customer_reviews.title: Contains concentrations most used in the research
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't taking for pain, so no comments on that. Have not taken blood lab values of absorbency, so no comments on that. It is easy to swallow. unfortunately several of the Caps broke open, so when I take it out of the container my fingers get very yellow and it spreads everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me!
customer_reviews.text: A friend told me he used it for knee pain and had been for awhile , I'd been fighting sciatica for years and so I gave it a try . Works great ! I golf and do normal stuff again . I take one cap daily .
customer_reviews.author: Mike Fleetwood

customer_reviews.title: Did nothing for arthritis pain
customer_reviews.text: These were hyped up as being good for arthritis pain relief. In my case, they did nothing, after taking them for a month, no difference noticed. Still taking over the counter pain relief meds. The search continues
customer_reviews.author: AFR

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: this definitely helps with my knee and back aches and pains!! also helps my husband with his prostate. we have tried other brands and like this one. this is cheaper than in our stores as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shelli Coffin

customer_reviews.title: This Tumeric Supplement Really Works
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Provided fairly immediate relief for my arthritis pain and stiffness.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Craig

customer_reviews.title: All natural anti-inflammatory
customer_reviews.text: I use this to help with anti-inflammatory. My parents came to visit and they've started taking it as well. Really great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. McCorry

customer_reviews.title: ... turmeric to help with pain from inflammation- I was pretty skeptical! I've gotten relief from hip and knee ...
customer_reviews.text: My Rheumatologist suggested I try turmeric to help with pain from inflammation- I was pretty skeptical! I've gotten relief from hip and knee pain with this product.....I'm not so skeptical any longer!!
customer_reviews.author: Wible

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchasing experience
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchasing experience. The product seems to work and several family members are currently taking it and all report feeling better.
customer_reviews.author: MPK

customer_reviews.title: best value on amazon
customer_reviews.text: 20 bucks for 1/3 a year. price per serving on this cant be beet. bottle came packed full. will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it takes awhile for this to work as an anti-inflammatory, so we shall see. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Donna Connors

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be okay.
customer_reviews.text: I don't feel that I have used this product long enough to give it a real rating. I don't have anything negative to say either.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: I will have to wait and see if it does ...
customer_reviews.text: I will have to wait and see if it does what it says before I can make a more accurate review.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Stained fingers.
customer_reviews.text: I like the turmeric however these aren't sealed well at all. There is turmeric all over all of them and they stain my finger every day. So annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Jeepstar

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: What's not to love about this? Turmeric has been a life savior for my family even my fur babies if ur looking to purchase this! I've had nothing but good results w this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Peckster87

customer_reviews.title: Giving it more time
customer_reviews.text: Its only been a weem since using i really cant give a good nor bad review cause I dont notice any change as of yet
customer_reviews.author: PBennett

product_meta.title: Nutricost Turmeric Curcumin with BioPerine (95% Curcuminoids) 120 Capsules, 500mg Per Cap, Gluten Free, Non-GMO
product_meta.description: Turmeric has been used in Asia for thousands of years. Nutricost Turmeric contains 500mg in each capsule and 120 capsules in each bottle.
feature_bullets: Turmeric 500mg Per Capsule & 120 Easy To Swallow Capsules Per Bottle
High Quality, Non-GMO, Gluten Free, Potent Turmeric Curcumin Pills
Made in a GMP Compliant, FDA Registered Facility
